Claim: "Two sweet young girls on ice skates get ready to begin their performance on the ice."
Implication: "Two female synchronized swimmers are in the pool."
Referring expressions: Two sweet young girls, ice skates, performance on the ice.  Two female synchronized swimmers, pool
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsSweet(a) and IsOnIceSkates(b) and IsPerformingOnTheIce(c))))) -> (exists e (exists d (IsFemale(d) and IsInPool(e))))
